name: The Devil's Soul Inside Me
summary: In the thriving Towa City, you, an average high school student with a love for spicy food and fantasy games, are about to unravel a staggering truth… Believing yourself to be human, you're haunted by gruesome dreams of your past life as the Demon King Caacrinolaas. As you grapple with your newfound identity, torn between your chivalrous nature and the dark power within, the fate of two worlds hangs in the balance. Can you resist the call of your former existence, choosing the path of a normal human, or will you succumb to your inner demons, ushering in a New Age of darkness and chaos?
